name: It Follows Me
description:
It Follows Me

Created in just a few hours for the Coding Blocks Game Jam '22, this is a simple riff on a word search. If the first word contains ME and the second word contains IT, slap that Thumbs Up button.  If they don't, slap that Thumbs Down button.

It's just that easy!

Yes, the concept here is very literal... You're looking for the word ME followed by the word IT, get it?!?!😆
